articles.description: Tottenham weren't ready for what Rangers threw at them but got out of jail with their Europa League equaliser, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Rangers 1-1 Tottenham: 'Lost tourists ransacked by ruthless hosts in Europa League'

articles.description: Andre Onana was in the spotlight after another mistake in the Europa League - but is he a key player for Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim?
articles.title: Andre Onana: Is Man Utd keeper part of problem or solution for Ruben Amirom?

articles.description: Tottenham boss Ange Postecoglou says Timo Werner's performance was "not acceptable" after replacing him at half-time in the 1-1 Europa League draw with Rangers.
articles.title: Timo Werner: Tottenham forward's performance 'not acceptable' - Ange Postecoglou

articles.description: Chelsea are in the middle of a busy December and with games every three or four days, which of their fringe players have been staking their claim for Premier League chances?
articles.title: 'He's been watching Suarez' - the Chelsea fringe players impressing

articles.description: Teenage attacker Lily Murphy scores her first senior goal as Manchester City ease to victory against St Polten, though the win is overshadowed by Alex Greenwood being taken off on a stretcher.
articles.title: Man City 2-0 St Polten: Lily Murphy scores on debut but Alex Greenwood injured

articles.description: Police believe Tom Voyce tried to cross a flooded ford and his car was pulled along by the current.
articles.title: Tom Voyce: Missing rugby star's body found after Storm Darragh

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes admits he put "too much emphasis" on next year's Ashes in Australia and will now be "toning down expectations".
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Ben Stokes admits putting 'too much emphasis' on Ashes

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on darts star Stephen Bunting with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v darts star Stephen Bunting

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Copenhagen vs Hearts in the UEFA Conference League
articles.title: Copenhagen v Hearts: UEFA Conference League stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: Alessia Russo produces two brilliant finishes as Arsenal comfortably beat Valerenga to win their fourth Champions League game on the bounce.
articles.title: Valerenga 1-3 Arsenal: Alessia Russo scores twice for the Gunners
